meanings.sent1: She was quietening her voice to avoid waking the baby.
meanings.sent2: The teacher was quietening the noisy classroom.
meanings.sent3: The magician's spell was quietening the chatty parrots.
meanings.sent4: The sunset was quietly quietening the bustling city streets.
meanings.sent5: The gentle rain was quietening the sounds of the forest.

meanings.definition: The act of making or becoming quiet.
meanings.sent1: The quietening of the room was a relief after the loud party.
meanings.sent2: His gentle touch had a quietening effect on the anxious dog.
meanings.sent3: The quietening of the storm brought a sense of peace to the town.
meanings.sent4: The quietening of the audience signaled the start of the performance.
meanings.sent5: The gradual quietening of the city at night was a soothing lullaby.
